Item.Value: [Name:Introduction][Text:Hello! My name is $Actor_12$, it's so nice to meet you. I've been on the road for a few days and it's such a relief to relax. I hear that you're looking for more people? I'd love to settle down here.]
[Name:Task_4_Start][Text:I don't need much to be happy really, just a small place to call my own.][UnlockObjectID:5]
[Name:Ulm][Text:I don't think I like the way $Actor_43$ looks at my chickens. I'm not saying we can't ever eat them, but... she seems overly eager.][Default][Villager:43]
